termsContent.title: Smile AI Studio Terms of Service

sections.heading: 1. Service Description
sections.text: Smile AI Studio is an AI-powered visual creation platform offering image generation, video creation, and HD upscaling services. By using this platform, you agree to comply with the following terms.

sections.heading: 2. Prohibited Content (Important)
sections.text: Users are strictly prohibited from generating, uploading, or distributing the following content:
list: Pornographic, obscene, or sexually suggestive content
Politically sensitive content that undermines national sovereignty or unity
Content that infringes on others' portrait rights, reputation, or privacy
Content that infringes intellectual property rights
Any content that violates applicable laws and regulations

sections.heading: 3. Violation Handling
sections.text: For users who violate the above rules, the platform reserves the right to: suspend or terminate accounts, delete violating content, and forfeit remaining credits without refund. In severe cases, the platform will cooperate with authorities for legal action.

sections.heading: 4. Credits & Payment
sections.text: Credits are virtual currency and non-refundable once purchased. The platform reserves the right to adjust credit pricing and consumption rules.

sections.heading: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.text: Users retain usage rights to content generated through this platform, but the platform reserves the right to use such content for model improvement and service optimization. Users may not use generated content for illegal purposes.

sections.heading: 6. Disclaimer
sections.text: AI-generated content may contain inaccuracies or imperfections. The platform makes no guarantees regarding the accuracy or completeness of generated content. The platform is not liable for any losses caused by users' use of generated content.

sections.heading: 7. Terms Modification
sections.text: The platform reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.heading: 1. Information Collection
sections.text: We collect the following information to provide our services:
list: Account information: phone number or email address
Usage data: generation history, activity logs
Device information: browser type, operating system
Payment information: processed through third-party payment platforms; we do not store complete payment details

sections.heading: 2. Information Usage
sections.text: Collected information is used solely for: providing and improving services, processing transactions, sending service notifications, and preventing abuse and fraud. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sections.heading: 3. Information Security
sections.text: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encrypted transmission and storage. However, please note that no internet transmission can be guaranteed 100% secure.

sections.heading: 4. Generated Content
sections.text: Your prompts and generated content may be used for content safety review. Generated images and videos will be automatically deleted after a retention period based on your subscription tier.

sections.heading: 5. Your Rights
sections.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the Help Center.

sections.heading: 6. Cookies
sections.text: We use cookies and local storage to maintain login status and user preferences.

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.text: Register an account to receive free credits. Choose a model, enter a text description, and start creating. Supports image generation, video creation, and HD upscaling.

sections.heading: Credits
sections.text: Different models and parameters consume different amounts of credits. Higher resolution and longer videos cost more credits. See the Model Pricing page for detailed consumption rules.

sections.heading: Content Guidelines
sections.text: Please follow platform content guidelines. Generating pornographic, political, violent, or other prohibited content is strictly forbidden and will result in account suspension. See Terms of Service for details.

items.a: Failed generations do not consume credits. Check if your prompt contains prohibited content and try again.
Purchase subscription plans or invite friends to earn credits.
We currently support Alipay and PayPal.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.text: For other questions, please email a1205061933@gmail.com
